step_feedback.feedback: Good job bringing your arms in front of your chest and tightening your muscles. Ensure your fingers are closed into fists.
You opened your fingers and extended your arms well. Try to relax your muscles more as you exhale and extend.
Excellent work opening your fingers and extending your arms. Keep focusing on relaxing your muscles as you exhale.
Good extension of your arms. For the next repetitions, try to relax your muscles more as you exhale and extend.
You're doing great with the arm movements. Remember to fully relax your muscles when you exhale and extend your arms.

exercise_summary: You did a good job with the horizontal pumping exercise. Remember to fully open your fingers and extend your arms while relaxing your muscles as you exhale. Keep up the great work!
